educations.school: City University of New York - Hunter College
content: Courses: Software Engineering, Intro to APIs, Database Management, Operating Systems, Advanced Algorithms, Digital Product Development

description: Conducting technology training sessions for 40+ adult learners, improving their digital literacy and proficiency with essential Google Suite software and hardware
Developing and maintaining instructional materials and training guides, ensuring 100% of learners had access to clear, structured learning resources
Developed state of the art visualization tools for researchers and doctors to envision large biological datasets using ​Angular 11​, Node & Vega.​
Devised an algorithm to compute statistics that highlight anomalies in the data and displayed them on an intuitive interface.
Created detailed UX flows, experience maps, wire-frames and conducted interviews across various biological consortia to enhance user experience.
Developed 12+ user stories and training guides for new software rollouts, ensuring seamless adoption
Gathered stakeholder requirements for a user-friendly account management system, improving accessibility
Published product releases to the team to inform new product updates and organizational alignment
Acted as a liaison between technical teams/stakeholders to translate customer needs into specifications
Developed 3+ data visualizations and conducted exploratory data analysis for NYT's ad performance platform, using D3.js to address data visibility challenges faced by sales planners and data analysts
Developed data visualization tools to improve usability for non-technical sales planners and analysts
Created 2+ product briefs outlining improvements to user experience and technical training materials

Developed a MongoDB data migration command line tool using Click and PyMongo that promotes collections to higher testing environments resulting in automating the time-consuming and error-prone process of manual operation of collection changes by writing/reviewing installable packages, CI/CD testing, and packaging

Built a MongoDB Python package that validates database schemas, clusters and collections by designing a software architecture diagram using Draw.io to exemplify system interactions used to team members and stakeholders
